apiClassifier.shortdesc: A simple extension of an image, inmplementing the selectable idea.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A simple extension of an image, inmplementing the selectable idea. This image can be uses with others to simulate an image based single- or multiple choice construct.

apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.

apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.

apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.

apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for a Spark RadioButton component.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The default skin class for a Spark Panel container.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for a Spark Panel container.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The default skin class for Spark TextInput component.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for Spark TextInput component.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for the Spark Button component.

apiClassifier.apiDesc: The default skin class for Spark TextInput component.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines the minimal criteria for a class to be a module.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Defines the minimal criteria for a class to be a module. This makes it possible for the MainAppManager to load any Module with the same abstract sequence of instructions.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines the minimum criteria to be clickable and refer to any object, which many of the buttons need in this app.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
Defines the minimum criteria to be clickable and refer to any object, which many of the buttons need in this app.
There are many different Types of buttons in this application, many of them have refer to a sound and therefore we need to generalize the properties of a button which makes ist possible to play a sound by clickign itr dragging it

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This interface helps to generalize objects, for example stored runtime in an array or so, to call the very helpful removeAllEventListeners function.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
This interface helps to generalize objects, for example stored runtime in an array or so, to call the very helpful removeAllEventListeners function.
It is required to extends Shared.EventDispatcher to implement this interface

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This interface is for accessing information of any selectable component.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
This interface is for accessing information of any selectable component. These components are generally used within questions. It allows the program to iterate the references and look for already selected Objects. Instead of overwriting the synchronize() function in each new question class, you just have to assure it implements this interface.
By using this, it is possible to implement a radio button or check box behavior for an image or other visual components, without extending these classes

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Adds the textvalue to a component.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Adds the textvalue to a component. Makes possible to implement writable components and access them runtime via arrays or lists or other runtime build references.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the process of loading, arrangin and displaying data for a selection of images and a textarea.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents the process of loading, arrangin and displaying data for a selection of images and a textarea.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides a cloud of radiobuttons and labels to click.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Provides a cloud of radiobuttons and labels to click. The positions within the cloud will be chosen randomly and the cloud can increase its size by having trouble with positioning elements due to limited space.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Representing the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a single choice item.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Representing the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a single choice item. The data model is a radiobutton group, whcih allows only one choice per question.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines the basic structure and bahvior of a question object.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
Defines the basic structure and bahvior of a question object. The detailed behavior like load and display data is defined in each of the extending quesion classes.
A special feature is the load content by page behavior. All Data will be loaded immediately after calling the specific questionspage and will be unloaded by calling another questionpage. This frees memory and enables a fluid application.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Representing the loading, arranging and displaying data for a cloze text.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Representing the loading, arranging and displaying data for a cloze text.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a multiple choice item.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a multiple choice item. The data model is a checkbox group, which allows one or many or all selected choices as an answer.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines a set of events realted to the item object and its children.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Defines a set of events realted to the item object and its children. Also stores the result xml of the actual item, in order to pass it to other handlers.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a handler for all item releated actions.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a handler for all item releated actions.

apiClassifier.shortdesc:
XML Loader Class
Version: 0.1.6 DOC: 02.11.2010 Author: Jan K端ster
Last Update: 09.11.2010
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
XML Loader Class
Version: 0.1.6 DOC: 02.11.2010 Author: Jan K端ster
Last Update: 09.11.2010

apiClassifier.shortdesc: the handler class for an overview, where users will choose their next testcollection by choosing a dimension and the corresponding level.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: the handler class for an overview, where users will choose their next testcollection by choosing a dimension and the corresponding level.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: First module, loaded after initialization of the application.

apiDesc.p: First module, loaded after initialization of the application. Includes a VideoPlayer for introducing the applications funcionalities.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The core controller class.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The core controller class. Manages the loading and unloading of the modules as well as the communication between them and the model related data. Modules a loaded by name, their functions are accessed via ICustomModule interface. The view component of the modules get connected with the DisplayManager

apiClassifier.shortdesc: After finishing a test, this Class is loaded to provide functions for printing the evaluation and choosing the further activities.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: After finishing a test, this Class is loaded to provide functions for printing the evaluation and choosing the further activities.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The DisplayManager is one of the core classes to provide a management all visual components.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: The DisplayManager is one of the core classes to provide a management all visual components. This allows the MainAppmanager to include or remove specific view components of a module.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a login form handler.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a login form handler. User input will be sent to the server, server evaluates and answers with a value. The value influences the state of the handler and either a login is performed or fault or a new user code is requestet.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A static class, representing a sequence to arrange the required modules in a predefined order.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A static class, representing a sequence to arrange the required modules in a predefined order.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A class representing one testcollection of a dimension / subject.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A class representing one testcollection of a dimension / subject.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This is a Data Structure, where each session for one item is stored.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: This is a Data Structure, where each session for one item is stored. In detail, it stores the slected dimension, level and item. This ensures, that application always knows, where the user is at the moment.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class loads the xml with the contained information about subjects, levels and item IDs and parse it into an XMLLIST.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
This class loads the xml with the contained information about subjects, levels and item IDs and parse it into an XMLLIST.
The data is read-only and will be written only once when the class will be initialized
To overwirte the data, the class must be unloaded and be instanciated again

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class represents the login session of a certain user.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: This class represents the login session of a certain user. The information are stored temporarily and usually written in an xml file which will be permanently send to the server.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class represents a dimension or subject with all its included data.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: This class represents a dimension or subject with all its included data.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class is a model for all global settings like paths and labels.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
This class is a model for all global settings like paths and labels.
The globals.xml file will be analysed and the particular data will be stored in different arrays

apiClassifier.shortdesc: XML writer Class Version: 0.1.2 DOC: 09.11.2010 Author: Jan K端ster Last Update: 12.01.2011 Description: Similar to XLoader, this Class is made for connecting to php but sending data instead of retreiving data.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: XML writer Class Version: 0.1.2 DOC: 09.11.2010 Author: Jan K端ster Last Update: 12.01.2011 Description: Similar to XLoader, this Class is made for connecting to php but sending data instead of retreiving data.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Creates a new wrapper for loaded mp3 files.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Creates a new wrapper for loaded mp3 files. Can handle all required events for a common mp3 player like play, pause, stop etc. The underlying data structure is a Sound Object.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Static class.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Static class. Prepares a custom error type to be send to server which writes an error log

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Lays out elements the same way as text area positions words: putting them in one line and going to next line when there is no space for new word.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
Lays out elements the same way as text area positions words: putting them in one line and going to next line when there is no space for new word.
copyright: Maxim Kachurovskiy http://cookbooks.adobe.com/post_Horizontal_Multiline_Layout-17807.html
Code is modified by Jan Kuester, University of bremen jank87

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Basic class which automatically loads an image from url and catches errors as well as allows a dynamic adding or removing of eventlisteners.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Basic class which automatically loads an image from url and catches errors as well as allows a dynamic adding or removing of eventlisteners. Be aware, that it requires the data as a base64 string.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An extended Button class, implementing the minimum criteria for linking to other objects and removeAllEventListeners function.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
An extended Button class, implementing the minimum criteria for linking to other objects and removeAllEventListeners function.
Most buttons in this Application will extend this

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This Class contains a set of static functions which will be called by any class in the project.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: This Class contains a set of static functions which will be called by any class in the project. Its a kind of collection of generic functions.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A utility class to decode a Base64 encoded String to a ByteArray.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A utility class to decode a Base64 encoded String to a ByteArray. Extends Shared.EventDispatcher to dispatch and remove events dynamically

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An event class for passing session related values via event.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: An event class for passing session related values via event. Especially useful if you want to avoid to code this into an interface (and therefore into all other module classes).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class overrides the eventdispatcher to allow a removal of all eventListeners of an Object.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: This class overrides the eventdispatcher to allow a removal of all eventListeners of an Object. Idea and concept by Justin Shacklette, Copyright holds Justin Shacklette www.saturnboy.com

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Enumeration of error types to indicate the number and the type of the error.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Enumeration of error types to indicate the number and the type of the error.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Collection of enumeration ids, to access php parameters.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Collection of enumeration ids, to access php parameters. They are hardcoded, so changes in this file will require changes in the include php file and vice versa.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Collection of enumeration ids, to access globals parameters.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Collection of enumeration ids, to access globals parameters. They are hardcoded, so changes in this file will require changes in the globals file and vice versa.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Basic grid of an enumeration.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Basic grid of an enumeration.
